title: Why am I so bored and lay in bed all day, but I really want to do something but I just don’t want to because everything else is so boring? - Quora

response.answer_text: One reason could be your physical inactivity. You need to do get out of bed and be as physicaly active as you can. It may seem really boring and difficult and meaningless and useless and …. . but you will see the result gradually and it will surprise you, well most of the time :-) Start searching “how can I overcome sedentary lifestyle” 11 Ways to Fix a Sedentary Lifestyle

There is nothing wrong with being home. U just need to be comfortable in your home. And engage in things that U will enjoy to pass the time. I used to lay in bed all day. I was very depressed. As time went by. I got into writing poetry. My thoughts down. And I found a publisher who wanted a whole manuscript. I started reading again. Watching Bondi vet and shows I enjoy.
